item.title: Correction risks are lingering for market despite Trump optimism
item.description: Investors are decidedly buoyant following President Donald Trump's inauguration, but that could open the market up to some disappointment.

item.title: Defense stock is breaking out on the charts after an assist from a bank upgrade
item.description: Katie Stockton breaks down the charts in Northrop Grumman.

item.title: Top analyst Mayo says a new bank era is beginning under Trump
item.description: Big banks stand to benefit from more lax regulation and resulting loan growth, according to Wells Fargo's Mike Mayo.

item.title: 'Physical AI' is the next frontier for the artificial intelligence cycle. How to play it
item.description: Investors are looking for another way to play AI after huge runs in Nvidia and the other stocks powering and producing digital bots like ChatGPT.

item.title: Citi says buy this little-known nuclear play
